metadata.title: CVE-2023-3430 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenImageIO, where a heap buffer overflowexists in the src/gif.imageio/gifinput.cpp file. This flaw allows a remoteattacker to pass a specially crafted file to the application, whichtriggers a heap-based buffer overflow and could cause a crash, leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
